translation.en: Meow.
-[indistinct chatter] -[grunting]
Sorry!
Blast it.
[Merlin] Hisirdoux!
-[yells, grunts] -What have we talked about?
"Magic isn't a permissible shortcut to hard work."
translation.it: "È vietato usare la magia per evitare di faticare."

translation.en: Carry on, and don't…
-But, Master-- -…"but, Master" me.
I'm just-- I know I'm capable of more than just pushing a broom.
translation.it: È che... so di poter fare di più oltre a spazzare i pavimenti.

translation.en: Teach me to be a proper sorcerer!
translation.it: Insegnatemi a essere un vero mago!

translation.en: If there is a universal truth in this world,
translation.it: Se c'è una verità universale a questo mondo,

translation.en: it is that struggle is the flame which forges one's soul into steel.
translation.it: è che il sacrificio è la fiamma che forgia l'anima in acciaio.

translation.en: Magic cannot be a crutch.
translation.it: La magia non è una scorciatoia.

translation.en: To take the easy way out is to merely exist, Hisirdoux.
translation.it: Usare un espediente significa solo sopravvivere, Hisirdoux.

translation.en: So, why am I learning spells if I'm not supposed to use them?
translation.it: Perché studio gli incantesimi, se non posso usarli?

translation.en: I wanna be a wizard like you! With a staff and everything!
translation.it: Voglio essere uno stregone come voi! Con un bastone e tutto!

translation.en: Staffs are for those with mastery over magic,
translation.it: I bastoni sono per coloro che hanno padronanza della magia

translation.en: and magic is mastery over life. So first, you must learn how to live.
translation.it: e la magia è la padronanza della vita. Devi prima imparare a vivere.

translation.en: Master that lesson, and I vow your days of pushing brooms will be over.
translation.it: Padroneggia questa lezione e prometto che i tuoi giorni da sguattero finiranno.

translation.en: [sighs] Blast it.
"Magic isn't a permissible shortcut to hard work."
translation.it: "È vietato usare la magia per evitare di faticare."

translation.en: -'Night, Doux! Thanks for cleaning up! -Of course!
Right, time for the real work.
-You ready? -[meows]
[laughs] 'Tis my cleanest capture yet!
Aren't you a nasty little beast?
I figured an umber imp was the reason for all those lost pets.
translation.it: Sapevo che un folletto imp rapiva i cuccioli.

translation.en: That is not an umber imp.
translation.it: Quello non è un folletto imp.

translation.en: Do you notice the three mandibles?
translation.it: Non hai notato le tre mandibole?

translation.en: How it's phasing in and out of existence? That's a shadow mephit.
translation.it: Come appare e scompare? È un mephit delle ombre.

translation.en: And you should know your monsterology if you're going to use me as bait.
translation.it: Dovresti conoscere la mostrologia se vuoi usarmi come esca.

translation.en: Either way, let's take a sec to recognize that I've--
translation.it: Fermiamoci un attimo per riconoscere che io...

translation.en: we've done some very good magic tonight.
translation.it: che noi abbiamo eseguito un'ottima magia stasera.

translation.en: -Douxie, old pal-- -No, no, no, revel in the victory.
translation.it: - Douxie, vecchio mio... - No, festeggiamo la vittoria.

translation.en: We're unappreciated, Arch, silent sentinels
keeping the world safe from specters and demons and--
translation.it: che proteggono il mondo da spettri e demoni e...

translation.en: It's out of the trap, isn't it?
[Archie] Your capture technique is still weak, and you could use a couple more centuries of practice.
translation.it: La tecnica è scarsa, ti servirebbero un paio di secoli di pratica.

translation.en: I will not be lectured by someone who licks their own butt!
translation.it: - Parli tu che ti lecchi il sedere! - Si chiama igiene!

translation.en: -[Archie] It's hygienic! -No, no, not this one.
translation.it: - Parli tu che ti lecchi il sedere! - Si chiama igiene! No, non questo.

translation.en: Let's see you phase through this, you little git!
[chuckles] Got you-- This totally worked on that specterghast.
translation.it: Preso... Aveva funzionato con quel spectreghast.

translation.en: [Archie] Back in Babylon. That was a fun night. Heads up! No, it had five heads. [grunts] Arch!
translation.it: - A Babilonia. Che bella serata. La testa! - No, aveva cinque teste. Archie!

translation.en: Fuzz buckets! [grunting]
It's working!
I've-- I've almost… [grunting]
worn him down! [screams]
Uh… I've-- I've got it! I've got it! I've…
Also, unlike umber imps, mephits are vulnerable to fire.
translation.it: Diversamente dai folletti imp, i mephit sono sensibili al fuoco.

translation.en: Saucy midge.
Your pet-munching days are over! -Say "hi" to everyone in limbo for me. -[squealing]
translation.it: Sono finiti i pasti a base di cuccioli! Salutami tutti nel limbo.

translation.en: You're welcome, Arcadia!
Strange. A lone shadow mephit snacking on pets.
translation.it: Strano. Un solo mephit delle ombre che sgranocchia cuccioli.

translation.en: Where there's one, there's usually more.
[Merlin] Hisirdoux…
Merlin?
Merlin? Yes!
Finally, Arch! Our moment has arrived!
translation.it: Finalmente, Archie! È giunto il nostro momento!

translation.en: Master Merlin.
Hisirdoux, my faithful apprentice, I need--
translation.it: Hisirdoux, mio fedele apprendista, mi serve...

translation.en: You're darn right I've been faithful! I've been mopping for a millennium!
translation.it: Sono stato fedele, eccome! Ho spazzato per un millennio!

translation.en: Why didn't you send a raven or a text? There's texting now, you know.
translation.it: Perché non inviare un corvo, un messaggio? I messaggi esistono.

translation.en: -I was busy, as you know. -Yeah?
translation.it: - Come ben sai, ero impegnato. - Ah sì?

translation.en: Well, I've been quite busy, too, protecting the material plane while you weren't around.
translation.it: Anch'io ero impegnato a proteggere il piano materiale in vostra assenza.

translation.en: -Hisirdoux, I need you-- -About time.
I've been practicing my incantations and my spells--
Enough! Matters are most dire!
I need you to bring me the Guardians of Arcadia, with haste!
translation.it: Devi portarmi i Guardiani di Arcadia con la massima urgenza!

translation.en: Oh, it's our moment, all right, as errand boys.
translation.it: È il nostro momento, certo, di fare i galoppini.

translation.en: Man, the rest of this summer's gonna eat farts.
translation.it: Il resto di questa estate sarà di una noia mortale.

translation.en: Yeah, it is kind of hard to top destroying an alien god.
translation.it: La distruzione di un dio alieno è difficilmente superabile.

translation.en: Wingman did good. Proud.
translation.it: Braccio destro è strato bravo. Orgoglioso.

translation.en: But I lost my butt-stomping, ninja-space-angel girlfriend
translation.it: Ma ho perso la mia ragazza ninja-scalciante-angelo-spaziale

translation.en: and my creepslaying partner in the same afternoon.
translation.it: e il mio partner ammazzzamostri contemporaneamente.

translation.en: Yeah, I felt like that after Jim and Claire and everybody left on their quest--
translation.it: Mi sono sentito così dopo la partenza di Jim, Claire...

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, we're talking about my problems here, buttsnack.
translation.it: Ehi, stiamo parlando dei miei problemi, sfigato.

translation.en: Cat! Yum.
Ooh, hey, little guy!
You lost?
Beware. You, you are in grave danger.
translation.it: Fate attenzione. Siete in grave pericolo.

translation.en: Whoa! A cat with glasses!
The cat just talked and you're focused on its eyewear?
translation.it: Ha appena parlato e pensi agli occhiali?

translation.en: I've seen aliens, creeps, and trolls, Domzalski.
translation.it: Ho visto alieni, mostri e troll, Domzalski.

translation.en: So, yeah, I'd like to know why the talking cat's wearing glasses.
translation.it: Sì, vorrei sapere perché il gatto parlante indossa gli occhiali.

translation.en: Bad eyesight.
Not cat. Familiar.
"Familiar"? [chuckles] No way.
I'd remember if I met a cat with glasses.
translation.it: Ricorderei un gatto con gli occhiali.

translation.en: No. Wizard assistant.
"Assistant"? That's very offensive.
I am a wizard associate, thank you very much.
translation.it: Sono uno stregone associato, grazie mille.

translation.en: Now, come with me or the worst will come to pass.
Hey! Are you threatening me, pussycat?
No, I'm warning you.
Put simply, the world as you know it is about to end.
translation.it: In poche parole, il mondo che conoscete sta per finire.

translation.en: Meow.
[Toby] Wha…
Aw, not again! [yelling]
Sorry, this is a lot to process!
Pets can talk? The world is ending? Again?
translation.it: Animali parlanti? Fine del mondo? Di nuovo?

translation.en: Not the best timing, I know, but we need your help all the same.
translation.it: Pessimo tempismo, ma ci serve il vostro aiuto.

translation.en: Douxie? Wai-- Hold up!
I thought you worked at the cafe or were, like, a model or something.
translation.it: Pensavo lavorassi al bar o come modello.

translation.en: [chuckles] There's a lot about me you don't know.
translation.it: Non sapete molte cose di me.

translation.en: -Whoa! -What?
Come on, then.
The answers to all your questions are within.
Yeah, right. In a bookstore?
[Toby] Ah! There's flying books.
translation.it: Cosa? Ci sono dei libri volanti.

translation.en: Whoa!
Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
So cool! So cool! So cool!
-Ooh, what's that? -[Merlin] Put that down!
Thank the ether you're here.
We haven't a moment to waste.
-[Toby laughing] -Whoa! Crusty, creepy dude!
Though, I had hoped for more, Hisirdoux.
translation.it: Mi aspettavo qualcosa di più, Hisirdoux.

translation.en: I tried. I couldn't find the changelings or the aliens. I'm pretty sure most left the planet.
translation.it: Ci ho provato, ma niente mutanti o alieni. Molti avranno abbandonato il pianeta.

translation.en: Merlin, it's me-- Toby Domzalski!
You know, War Hammer, Guardian of Arcadia, Geology Club president.
translation.it: Martello da guerra, Guardiano di Arcadia, presidente del club di geologia.

translation.en: No one could forget you, chatty.
And Steve Palchuk, Creepslayer!
-I have no idea who you are. -[Palchuk yelps]
[Merlin] But we're desperate. Thankfully, we have the brute.
translation.it: Siamo disperati. Per fortuna, c'è il bruto.

translation.en: -Yum! [grunts] -I'm not anybody's lunch. Got it?
translation.it: - Gnam! - Non sono il pranzo di nessuno. Capito?

translation.en: Wait, where's Jimbo and Claire? I thought they were with you.
translation.it: E Jimbo e Claire? Pensavo fossero con te.

translation.en: Answers forthcoming.
Make preparations. We've a journey ahead.
translation.it: Preparatevi. Ci attende un viaggio. E non...

translation.en: -And don't… -But, Master--
translation.it: Preparatevi. Ci attende un viaggio. E non... - Ma Maestro... - ...dire: "Ma Maestro".

translation.en: …"but, Master" me.
But… are you sure you want to count on these children?
translation.it: Volete... proprio contare su questi bambini?

translation.en: -They're clearly not ready for this. -[scoffs] Excuse me, college dude,
translation.it: Chiaramente non sono pronti. Scusa, tizio del college,

translation.en: these children fought off a 50-foot extraterrestrial! [screams]
translation.it: questi bambini hanno battuto un extraterrestre di 15 metri!

translation.en: Dude, let go of its head!
-[Palchuk] It's got my head, too, man! -Just put it back!
translation.it: - Lui ha la mia! - Rimettila a posto!

translation.en: -Master, I'm ready for this. -Doubtful.
-I've spent years preparing, centuries-- -Silence!
translation.it: - Mi sono preparato per anni, secoli... - Silenzio!

translation.en: I mean, silence, all of you.
Can you not hear that?
Something wicked this way comes.
translation.it: Sta per accadere qualcosa di sinistro.

translation.en: [Merlin] Shadow mephits?
-Hisirdoux, did you lead them here? -No, no!
translation.it: - Hisirdoux, li hai condotti fin qui? - No!

translation.en: -I mean, I don't think so? [chuckles] -Yes, we did.
translation.it: - Cioè, non credo? - Sì, è così.

translation.en: He found us. The barrier won't hold for long.
translation.it: Ci ha trovati. La barriera non reggerà.

translation.en: We must make egress! Tobias, take my things!
translation.it: Dobbiamo uscire! Tobias, prendi le mie cose!

translation.en: All of you, to the roof!
Hisirdoux, I said get to safety.
-I've got this. I can help. -Ugh.
Still trying to earn that staff, are you?
translation.it: Vuoi ancora guadagnarti quel bastone, vero?

translation.en: Yeah. I've learned a thing or two since we last met.
translation.it: Ho imparato un paio di cosette dall'ultima volta.

translation.en: Use the Flux Rune Second. -It's stronger. -All right! I knew that!
translation.it: - La Seconda Runa di Flusso è più potente. - Certo! Lo sapevo!

translation.en: -Douxie! -Arch!
-[Archie] I'm fine. No need to worry. -[grunts]
Fire?
Yeah. Magic fire!
In a bookstore?
-But mephits are vulnerable to fire-- -Move it!
Stand back!
[Palchuk] Whoa!
Ship just got real!
-[Aaarrrgghh] Everyone on! -[screaming, grunting]
Look out! [grunts]
Awesome sauce!
This is so cool!
What the heck is that?
Welcome, young squires, to Camelot.
As in ancient-old-people-times Camelot?
translation.it: Come la Camelot dei tempi antichi?

translation.en: Excuse me, I have a question. How is this castle flying right now?
translation.it: Scusa, avrei una domanda. Come fa questo castello a volare?

translation.en: [Merlin] The Heart of Avalon.
Its magic keeps Camelot aloft, powered by time itself.
translation.it: La sua magia fa volare Camelot ed è alimentato dal tempo stesso.

translation.en: Sir Galahad, how look the skies?
translation.it: Sir Galahad, che aspetto ha il cielo?

translation.en: All quiet, my old friend!
[Merlin] Keep your eyes on the horizon.
I say, coming in a little hot, don't you think?
translation.it: Abbiamo acquistato troppa velocità, non credete?

translation.en: Rubbish!
[Toby] Whoa!
It's been 900 years since I was last here. Hasn't changed a bit.
translation.it: Sono passati 900 anni dall'ultima volta. Non è affatto cambiata.

translation.en: -Except for the flying part. -[chuckles]
"Nine hundred years"? Yeah, right.
You're like, what? Like, 19?
Give or take a few centuries.
[Palchuk] So, how many things can your cat turn into?
translation.it: In quante cose si trasforma il tuo gatto?

translation.en: [Douxie] That depends. How many things are there?
[Toby] Uh, cool floating castle ship,
but what's the grave danger you keep talking about?
translation.it: ma quale sarebbe il grave pericolo?

translation.en: Ah, there you are.
-Not so tight. -Oh, sorry.
Whoa, hey, Steve's here, too! How 'bout-- how 'bout some love for Steve?
translation.it: C'è anche Steve! Un po' di affetto anche per Steve?

translation.en: Oh. Hi, Steve.
What happened to you guys? -Wait, where's Jim? -[sighs]
translation.it: Cosa vi è successo? Un attimo, dov'è Jim?

translation.en: What happened to him?
[Blinky] We were ambushed.
Some ancient, dark warrior.
An unstoppable knight clad in green…
translation.it: Un cavaliere inarrestabile ricoperto di verde

translation.en: -[scream echoes] -…who struck down Master Jim.
Master, is that the same knight we saw at the bookstore?
translation.it: Maestro, è lo stesso cavaliere della libreria?

translation.en: One and the same.
That onyx shard is working its way towards his heart.
translation.it: Quella scheggia di onice sta raggiungendo il suo cuore.

translation.en: I placed the boy in stasis, stalling its progress… for now.
translation.it: Ho messo il ragazzo in stasi, per ora... la sta rallentando.

translation.en: If I had my Shadow Staff, I could've saved him.
translation.it: Se avessi avuto il Bastone dell'Ombra, avrei potuto salvarlo.

translation.en: Who is this Green Knight? How do I get my hands on him?
translation.it: Chi è questo Cavaliere Verde? Dov'è?

translation.en: I do not know.
The Green Knight said but one name, which chilled me to the bone.
translation.it: Il Cavaliere Verde disse solo un nome che mi fece rabbrividire.

translation.en: Oh, I hate that lady.
Wait, I thought we kicked her bee witch butt to the Shadow Realm.
translation.it: Pensavo l'avessimo cacciata nel Regno dell'Ombra.

translation.en: Which he appeared not to know, but he bore the emblem of Camelot.
translation.it: E lui sembrava non saperlo, ma portava l'emblema di Camelot.

translation.en: Come with me, quickly. I fear the answer lies in the past.
translation.it: Venite con me, svelti. Temo che la risposta si trovi nel passato.

translation.en: A dark menace is coming,
one even I cannot face alone.
translation.it: e nemmeno io posso affrontarla da solo.

translation.en: You are all now soldiers in a war started centuries ago
translation.it: Adesso siete tutti soldati in una guerra cominciata secoli fa

translation.en: for the world of magic.
Once, the realms of Magic and Man clashed in endless bloodshed.
translation.it: Tempo fa, i regni della Magia e dell'Uomo si scontrarono in un'infinita carneficina.

translation.en: King Arthur sought to wipe out magic that ravaged the lands
translation.it: Re Artù spazzò via la magia che devastava le terre

translation.en: in his war against Gunmar.
I brought what few spellcasters I could under my protection
translation.it: Riuscii a portare pochi incantatori sotto la mia protezione

translation.en: to spare them from the sword…
Including myself.
Oh, and Morgana le Fay.
She was the finest student I ever taught…
translation.it: Era l'allieva migliore a cui avessi mai insegnato...

translation.en: until she tried to kill me.
Thankfully, in my all-seeing wisdom, I created a secret weapon--
translation.it: Per fortuna, nella mia infinita saggezza, forgiai un'arma segreta...

translation.en: the Trollhunter amulet.
The war came to a standstill
and I imprisoned Morgana at the Battle of Killahead Bridge.
translation.it: e io imprigionai Morgana nella Battaglia del ponte di Killahead.

translation.en: [Merlin] This Green Knight that assailed us -was clearly born of dark magicks… -[gasps]
translation.it: Questo Cavaliere Verde che ci ha attaccato è nato dalla magia oscura,

translation.en: …but I have no memory of him
nor what connection he could have to Morgana.
translation.it: né quale legame possa avere con Morgana.

translation.en: We know not what he is nor why he pursues us.
translation.it: Non sappiamo cosa sia, né perché ci dia la caccia.

translation.en: Though, his presence is a dire omen of things to come. -[bell ringing] -[all gasp]
translation.it: Ma la sua presenza è un funesto presagio di ciò che verrà.

translation.en: -What's happening? -Have you never been under attack before?
translation.it: - Che sta succedendo? - Non sei mai stata attaccata?

translation.en: To the battlements!
[Palchuk grunts] Yeah! Battlements, totally!
What is a battlement?
[automated voice] I'm sorry, I couldn't find "bagel mints." Battlements!
-What the…? -[Archie] Oh, no!
I think we have something of a problem.
[Douxie] Oh, fuzz buckets.
[Merlin] No… the Arcane Order…
they found us.
Everyone, get to safety, now!
[grunts] My staff!
I've got it!
-[grunts] -I lost it!
-[grunts] -Man the cannons!
We must flee!
[Douxie] I'm on it! [grunts] I've got it, I've got it, I've got it.
translation.it: Ci penso io! Ce la faccio.

translation.en: They're boarding us!
We must break free!
-Steer us clear at my command! -[Douxie] I'm on it!
translation.it: - Al mio comando, allontanaci! - Ci penso io!

translation.en: All of a sudden, flying castles aren't so cool!
translation.it: I castelli volanti non sono così forti!

translation.en: Master Jim!
-Have you found the staff? -[Archie] I'm on it!
translation.it: - Hai trovato il bastone? - Ci sto provando!

translation.en: [grunts] Got you, Jim!
These foes' powers are beyond us!
translation.it: Non possiamo competere con questi nemici!

translation.en: -[Nari] Merlin! -No! Nari!
-[grunts] -This is all my fault.
I will take us to the past, but you must help me.
translation.it: Ci porterò nel passato, ma devi aiutarmi.

translation.en: I will do what I can.
[Claire] We've got to protect Jim!
I'm not losing him again!
-Feel the wrath of the hammer! -[Claire yelling]
[Palchuk] Die, creeper!
Where's the staff? Where's the staff?
Archie, find the staff or we are all dead meat!
translation.it: Trova il bastone o diventeremo carne da macello!

translation.en: [Archie] What do you people think I'm doing?
Archie, I'm running out of time, here!
translation.it: Archie, non mi resta molto tempo!

translation.en: [Archie] Got it!
Surrender, Merlin. [chuckles]
-Never. -[Galahad] Merlin!
Merlin!
Get everyone to safety!
Farewell, my old friend.
Hisirdoux, now!
Please don't blow us up. Please don't blow us up. We don't have enough power for the jump!
translation.it: - Non fateci saltare in aria. - Non abbiamo energia per il salto!

translation.en: [Douxie] Trust in Merlin!
Hold together. Come on!
[grunts] We have to steer Camelot through the time rift!
translation.it: Dobbiamo guidare Camelot attraverso la frattura temporale!

translation.en: [Green Knight] It ends…
now!
Oh, sod it all.
-What do we do, man? -Trust me!
Wait! No, no, no! [screams]
Flying castles suck!
Curses, Hisirdoux, you were supposed to steer us to safety!
translation.it: Maledizione, Hisirdoux, dovevi portarci in salvo!

translation.en: Must I always do everything myself?
translation.it: Devo sempre fare tutto da solo?

translation.en: Wh-- Where's the Trollhunter? They fell right through the portal.
translation.it: - Dov'è... il Cacciatore di Troll? - Sono precipitati nel portale.

translation.en: -Where did they go? -Great Gronka Morka…
translation.it: - Dove sono finiti? - Grande Gronka Morka...

translation.en: I fear it's not a question of where, but rather when.
translation.it: Temo che la domanda non sia dove, ma quando.

translation.en: Oh, come on! Come on!
This is gonna hurt!
[Palchuk screams] It… does… hurt!
-[Palchuk] Oh, God… -[Douxie groans, grunts]
I can't see! I'm blind!
Oh, I can see.
[Palchuk] What just happened?
Well, I just conjured an anti-gravity spell
to slow our fall and keep us from dying. You're welcome.
translation.it: per rallentare la discesa e impedirci di morire. Prego.

translation.en: Douxie, where is the flying castle?
Oh, fuzz buckets!
Well, it would appear we've had ourselves a temporal accident.
translation.it: Beh, a quanto pare abbiamo avuto un incidente temporale.

translation.en: -Which means? -[Palchuk whimpers]
-[gasps] -[man1] Advance! [man 2] Got them.
-[Palchuk screams] -It means…
we are lost in time.
[man 3] What manner of sorcery is this?
translation.it: Che razza di stregoneria è questa?

translation.en: Oh-- Oh, my…
